text: Begaye is a surname, derived from the Navajo word meaning "his/her son". Notable people with the surname include: *Enei Begaye, American activist *Fleming Begaye Sr. (1921-2019), Navajo code talker *Kelsey Begaye (born 1951), American politician *Nathan Begaye (1969–2010), Native American ceramics artist *Ray Begaye (born 1954), American politician *Russell Begaye, American politician ==See also== * Begay Category:Native American surnames Category:Navajo language
title: Begaye
